title: A Gathering of Lions and Lambs
description: It has been 268 days since the end of the world, but Jacob Trimble is still doing his best to survive it. Trying to salvage what is left of society is no easy task, especially when there are only a few hundred other survivors. A Gathering of Lions and Lambs is an emotionally-charged, character-based tale of a young man faced with helping a small remnant of humanity fight their way back from the brink of extinction.
author: Roger   Jackson
